site.author.name: CHANGE ME
site.title: CHANGE ME
auth.mailer.confirm.subject: Confirmation instructions
auth.mailer.confirm.body:
Welcome %s!

You can confirm your account email through the link below:

%s
auth.mailer.unlock.subject: Unlock instructions
auth.mailer.unlock.body:
Hello %s!

Click the link below to unlock your account:

%s
auth.mailer.password.subject: Reset password instructions
auth.mailer.password.body:
Hello %s!

Someone has requested a link to change your password. You can do this through the link below.

%s

If you didn't request this, please ignore this email.

Your password won't change until you access the link above and create a new one.
